definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
ticket/ballot/banknote/CL:張|张[zhang1]/person held for ransom/amateur performance of Chinese opera/classifier for groups, batches, business transactions
to float on the current/to drift along or about/rafting
to float/to hover/to drift (also fig., to lead a wandering life)/to rove/showy/superficial
to drift (in the tide)/to rove/to lead a wandering existence/drifter/wanderer
to skip stones (on water)/(coll.) to squander one's money on a bad investment

sentences.english: A power that keeps us from floating in the air. (P. 6)
sentences.chinese: 一种阻止我们在空气中漂的能力。

sentences.english: The white - washed wall is brilliant against the dark-blue sky.
sentences.chinese: 宝蓝色的夜空下，它的那垛墙漂白如玉，光采熠熠。

sentences.english: We went down the river in a long curve.
sentences.chinese: 我漂下河去，划出一条长长的曲线。

sentences.english: At night, it levitates rocks with psychic power and maps the position of the stars.
sentences.chinese: 晚上它用超能力使石头漂起来，制造星图。

sentences.english: The mechanism of enzyme-aided bleaching was summarized.
sentences.chinese: 同时对木聚糖酶的助漂机理进行了总结。

sentences.english: The parameters of scouring and bleaching of this kind of fabrics are discussed and analysed.
sentences.chinese: 探讨和分析了该织物的练漂工艺。

sentences.english: In a little while his heart and liver floated up, reddening the water.
sentences.chinese: 没多久，他的心和肝漂了上来，把湖水都染红了。

sentences.english: Rinsing canned beans before using also easesthe problem.
sentences.chinese: 在食用罐装红豆之前加以漂也可较好地解决该问题。

sentences.english: Several toy boats are afloat on the pond.
sentences.chinese: 几只玩具船在池潭里漂。

sentences.english: Then the robber, with a heavy axe, broke the chain that held the buoy.
sentences.chinese: 那强盗用一把大斧子砍断了拴着漂标的链子。

sentences.english: See that speck of tar floating in the water?
sentences.chinese: 看到水面漂的那些油斑了吗？

sentences.english: Little Sue sailed her paper ship in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 小苏在小溪里放漂她的纸船。

sentences.english: As the fat renders, the tallow will float to the surface of the boiling water.
sentences.chinese: 脂肪提炼后，动物脂就漂在沸水表面。

sentences.english: The results indicates that the pre-process of nonscald and natural dehydration is better than others.
sentences.chinese: 结果以不烫漂的自然脱水处理保存率较高。

sentences.english: Tourist Zone of Grand Canyon of Shandong first performs underground river drift in China.
sentences.chinese: 地下大峡谷激情演绎中国地下暗河第一漂。

sentences.english: And he cut down a stick, and cast it in thither; and the iron did swim.
sentences.chinese: 以利沙砍了一根木头，抛在水里，斧头就漂上来了。

definition: variant of 飄盪|飘荡[piao1 dang4]
scull (single oar worked from side to side over the stern of a boat) (free word)
to float away/to drift/to be swept off
to dye/to catch (a disease)/to acquire (bad habits etc)/to contaminate/to add color washes to a painting
